text:
Hey there.
I am about to start the migration of some integration to new API - currently using v1.
A bit confused about the create contact on CRM API.
When creating a contact, the way to link the contact with a company is by the name of the company instead of the ID?

Hey folks, I'm hoping to get some quick clarification. As of versions 3 of the API, have they deprecated the ability to update HubSpot Timeline events? There seems to be a way to create and update templates, and of course create timeline events...but there's no mention of a `PUT` to update them. Am I getting that right?
Hi, interested in setting this up for a client, Can we discuss?
Looking for a partner to help us out with a 'login from HubSpot' integration - pretty urgent, so please dm me if you have the capability :slightly_smiling_face:
